**Job Title: Associate Content Writer (Haryanvi Language)**

**Overview:**

STAGE is seeking a creative and passionate Associate Content Writer to join our growing content team. As an Associate Content Writer, you will be responsible for crafting engaging and culturally relevant content in Haryanvi for our entertainment platform. You will contribute to the development of scripts, dialogues, stories, and other content formats that resonate with our audience and reinforce the cultural identity of the Haryanvi-speaking community. This is an excellent opportunity for a recent graduate or early-career professional with a strong understanding of Haryanvi culture and language, and a desire to contribute to a dynamic and innovative media platform.

**Key Responsibilities:**

*   Write compelling and original content in Haryanvi, including scripts, dialogues, stories, articles, and social media posts.
*   Adapt existing content from other languages into Haryanvi, ensuring cultural relevance and linguistic accuracy.
*   Conduct research on Haryanvi culture, traditions, folklore, and current events to ensure authenticity and accuracy in content.
*   Collaborate with the content team, including senior writers, editors, and directors, to develop and refine content ideas.
*   Proofread and edit content to ensure it meets quality standards for grammar, spelling, and style.
*   Stay up-to-date on trends in Haryanvi language and culture, as well as in the entertainment industry.
*   Contribute to brainstorming sessions and provide creative input on content development.
*   Assist with content scheduling and distribution across various platforms.
*   Ensure all content aligns with STAGE's brand guidelines and editorial standards.
*   Actively participate in team meetings and contribute to a collaborative work environment.

**Required Skills and Qualifications:**

*   Fluency in Haryanvi (native speaker preferred) with excellent written and verbal communication skills.
*   Strong understanding of Haryanvi culture, traditions, and folklore.
*   Excellent writing and storytelling skills, with the ability to create engaging and culturally relevant content.
*   Ability to adapt to different writing styles and content formats.
*   Strong attention to detail and excellent proofreading skills.
*   Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
*   Strong research skills and ability to gather information from various sources.
*   Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint).
*   Passion for regional content and a desire to contribute to the preservation and promotion of Haryanvi culture.

**Preferred Qualifications:**

*   Bachelor's degree in Journalism, Mass Communication, Literature, or a related field.
*   Experience writing scripts, dialogues, or stories for entertainment platforms.
*   Familiarity with social media platforms and content creation for social media.
*   Knowledge of SEO principles and best practices for online content.
*   Experience with content management systems (CMS).

**Education Requirements:**

*   Bachelor's degree (preferred) in any field.

**Additional Requirements/Benefits:**

*   Portfolio of writing samples in Haryanvi (preferred).
*   Competitive salary and benefits package.
*   Opportunity to work in a fast-paced and innovative environment.
*   Chance to contribute to the growth of a leading entertainment platform for regional cultures.
*   Be a part of a dynamic team featured on Shark Tank India S2!
*   This is a full time position.

## Sr. Frontend Engineer - Shaping the Future of Regional Entertainment

**About STAGE:**

STAGE is an entertainment platform for regional cultures, started in 2019, known for producing premium quality content in Indian languages to reinforce, protect and validate people’s sense of identity for their culture and heritage. We currently focus on Haryanvi, Rajasthani, and Bhojpuri languages. Our mobile apps have 15 Mn+ downloads and 4 Mn+ paying customers globally, making STAGE the biggest media platform in these regions. In 2023, STAGE was also featured on Shark Tank India S2.

**Job Overview:**

We are seeking a passionate and talented Sr. Frontend Engineer to join our dynamic engineering team. As a Sr. Frontend Engineer, you will play a crucial role in building and enhancing the user interfaces for our web and mobile platforms. You will be responsible for translating designs and wireframes into high-quality code, ensuring a seamless and engaging user experience for our growing user base. You will work closely with product managers, designers, and other engineers to deliver innovative features that contribute to the growth and success of STAGE.

**Key Responsibilities:**

*   Develop and maintain responsive and user-friendly web and mobile interfaces using modern frontend technologies.
*   Write clean, well-documented, and testable code.
*   Collaborate with designers and product managers to translate user stories and mockups into functional and visually appealing components.
*   Participate in code reviews to ensure code quality and maintainability.
*   Contribute to the development and maintenance of our frontend architecture and component library.
*   Identify and address performance bottlenecks and optimize frontend code for speed and scalability.
*   Stay up-to-date with the latest frontend technologies and trends.
*   Troubleshoot and debug issues across various browsers and devices.
*   Contribute to the continuous improvement of our development processes and tooling.
*   Participate in agile development practices, including sprint planning, daily stand-ups, and retrospectives.

**Required Skills and Qualifications:**

*   1-3 years of experience in frontend development.
*   Strong proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
*   Experience with modern JavaScript frameworks such as React (preferred), Angular, or Vue.js.
*   Solid understanding of responsive design principles and cross-browser compatibility.
*   Experience with state management libraries like Redux, Zustand or Context API.
*   Experience with RESTful APIs and asynchronous data handling.
*   Familiarity with version control systems, particularly Git.
*   Experience with testing frameworks (e.g., Jest, Mocha, Cypress).
*   Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.
*   Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
*   Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment.

**Preferred Qualifications:**

*   Experience with TypeScript.
*   Experience with mobile development frameworks like React Native or Flutter.
*   Familiarity with UI/UX design principles.
*   Experience with building and maintaining component libraries.
*   Experience with performance optimization techniques.
*   Knowledge of SEO best practices.
*   Understanding of CI/CD pipelines.
*   Experience with cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.

**Education Requirements:**

*   Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field, or equivalent practical experience.

**Additional Requirements and Benefits:**

*   A passion for building high-quality user experiences.
*   A strong desire to learn and grow in a fast-paced environment.
*   Competitive salary and benefits package.
*   Opportunity to work on a product that impacts millions of users.
*   A collaborative and supportive work environment.
*   Opportunity to contribute to a growing and innovative company.
*   Flexible work arrangements.
*   Learning and development opportunities.

**Job Title:** Associate Content Marketing Manager

**Overview:**

STAGE, India's leading entertainment platform for regional cultures, is seeking a highly motivated and creative Associate Content Marketing Manager to join our growing marketing team. In this role, you will be responsible for developing and executing content strategies that drive audience engagement, acquisition, and retention across our Haryanvi, Rajasthani, and Bhojpuri language platforms. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to create compelling content that reinforces, protects, and validates people’s sense of identity for their culture and heritage. This is an exciting opportunity to contribute to a Shark Tank India S2 featured startup (2023) with over 15 Mn+ downloads and 4 Mn+ paying customers globally.

**Key Responsibilities:**

*   Develop and implement content marketing strategies aligned with STAGE's overall business goals and brand identity.
*   Create engaging and culturally relevant content across various formats, including blog posts, articles, social media updates, video scripts, email marketing campaigns, and website copy, targeting our Haryanvi, Rajasthani, and Bhojpuri-speaking audiences.
*   Conduct thorough research on trending topics, audience interests, and competitor activities within the regional entertainment landscape.
*   Manage content calendars and ensure timely delivery of high-quality content.
*   Optimize content for search engines (SEO) and social media platforms.
*   Collaborate with designers, video editors, and other content creators to produce visually appealing and impactful content.
*   Analyze content performance metrics and identify opportunities for improvement.
*   Monitor social media channels and engage with our audience to build community and brand loyalty.
*   Stay up-to-date with the latest content marketing trends and technologies.
*   Assist with the execution of marketing campaigns and promotions.
*   Work closely with the marketing team to ensure brand consistency across all channels.
*   Contribute to the development of content guidelines and best practices.

**Required Skills and Qualifications:**

*   1-3 years of experience in content marketing, digital marketing, or a related field.
*   Excellent writing, editing, and proofreading skills in English and Hindi.
*   Native or near-native fluency in Haryanvi, Rajasthani, or Bhojpuri is a MUST.
*   Strong understanding of content marketing principles and best practices.
*   Experience with content management systems (CMS) and social media platforms.
*   Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
*   Strong analytical skills and the ability to interpret data to make informed decisions.
*   Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
*   Passion for regional Indian culture and entertainment.

**Preferred Qualifications:**

*   Experience in the entertainment industry or a related field.
*   Knowledge of SEO best practices and keyword research.
*   Experience with video marketing and social media advertising.
*   Familiarity with marketing automation tools.
*   Experience with content creation tools such as Adobe Creative Suite.
*   Basic graphic design skills.

**Education Requirements:**

*   Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, Journalism, or a related field.

**Additional Requirements and Benefits:**

*   Ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
*   A strong work ethic and a passion for learning.
*   Competitive salary and benefits package.
*   Opportunity to work on exciting and impactful projects.
*   Be a part of a growing, innovative company featured on Shark Tank India S2.
*   Opportunity for professional growth and development.
*   Comprehensive Health Insurance.
*   Flexible work environment.
